name: Anime Fantasy Jigsaw Puzzle 3D
description:
Epic naughty puzzles full of charm!
With colorful characters with careful design in a world of medieval fantasy that will not leave you unscathed ...

  • 3D game with the possibility of moving in the environment (360 ° movement) (Possibility of flipping puzzle pieces and rotating)
  • Medieval Fantasy with Stylized Anime Characters
  • 15 Puzzles
  • 5 Extras Puzzles
  • Each puzzle consists of 6, 24, 54, 96 and 150 pieces to choose from!
  • Substantial playing time
  • Medieval Fantasy
  • Soothing and satisfying music
  • 3 Maps between which you can change as you wish.
  • Gallery available in the game
